articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is the peerlessly patriot and ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander as he resolutely beat back the armed invasion of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and firmly defended the destiny and sovereignty of the country and the nation, made the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, present a document of surrender and created the military miracle to be specially recorded in the world history of wars.
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il provided the powerful war deterrent for self-defense with his original Songun politics to defend socialism centered on the popular masses and had led the anti-U.S. confrontation without gun-report to the victory for decades, thus making it sure that the history and tradition of war victory created by Kim Il Sung are given a steady continuity.
					
					 You, respected Marshal, advanced the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force with the firm will to bring about the final victory in the standoff with the U.S. with arms of Songun which is associated with the whole life of the Generalissimos, trained the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and turned the homeland into a world-level nuclear and rocket power possessed of even H-bomb and ICBM.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite another war against the DPRK, all members of the Association will promptly rush toward the homeland to stand in the same trench with its people and defeat the enemies with retaliatory fire prepared for centuries and contribute to creating a new legendary story about war victory.

articles.title: Greetings to Syrian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian FM
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Walid Al-Muallem, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of Syria, on July 25, the 51st anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					 The message said the Korean people are rejoiced over the historical and traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided by their preceding leaders that are developing favorably.
					
					 Extending support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people's struggle for sovereignty, security and territorial integrity of the country, Ri Yong Ho in the message wished Walid Al-Muallem bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman's Answer Distributed as UN Document
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman's Answer Distributed as UN Document
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The answer, given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry to clarify the DPRK's resolute stand against the move of the hostile forces for cooking up another "sanctions resolutions" over the DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14, was distributed as an official document A/71/985-S/2017/610 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on July 24.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests, including the delegation of Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 The visitors paid homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the great leaders in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 Then they went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for the field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, civilians from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen standing there was a floral basket from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets, together with bouquets and flowers, in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid homage to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Floral baskets were also placed before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons and civilians and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Martyrs on War Victory Day in DPRK
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Martyrs on War Victory Day in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the statues and cemeteries and tombs of martyrs and memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army across the country on Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and schools, men and officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), working people, school youth and children.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the memory of the martyrs.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen standing there were wreaths bearing the august name of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs and the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Laid at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri were wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK. At the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery was a wreath in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK State Affairs Commission.
					
					 Also, placed were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of KPA and KPISF, scientific, educational, public health and press organs and the party and power organs, institutions, farms, universities, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the memory of the martyrs.

articles.title: Revolutionary Opera "Three Days of Wolmi Island" Given
articles.content:
Revolutionary Opera "Three Days of Wolmi Island" Given
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary opera "Three Days of Wolmi Island" newly created by the Phibada Opera Troupe was given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday, the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were leading officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, those and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The opera showed with vivid artistic canvases the source of uncontrollable power of brave fighters of the Korean People's Army who devoted themselves to defending Wolmi Island, the island of the country, against formidable enemy out of match by use of only four artilleries in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Thursday to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The dancing parties in Pyongyang began with the playing of song "July 27 March".
					
					 The participants danced, paying the noblest homage and eternal glory to President Kim Il Sung who defeated the formidable imperialist forces with his distinguished military idea and superb strategy and tactics and created legendary stories about war victory of heroic Korea.
					
					 The festive mood revved up when songs "We Know Nobody but You" and "Train to the Front" carrying the pledge of the young vanguard to bring about the July 27 of final victory were played.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in all provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: DPRK Gains More Medals at Asian Weightlifting Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Gains More Medals at Asian Weightlifting Championships
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has proved successful at the 2017 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championships in Katmandu of Nepal.
					 Kang Hyon Gyong bagged three gold medals in the junior women's 58kg category event on July 25 and other players seven gold and two silver medals on July 26.
					
					 Song Kuk Hyang won four gold and two silver medals in the juvenile and junior women's 63kg category. And Pak Jong Ju lifted 138 kg in the junior men's snatch of 69kg category and 174kg in the junior men's jerk of the same category, thus coming first.

articles.title: War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 64th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Working people, youths and students across the country held colorful events on Thursday.
					
					 People from all walks of life visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the portraits of the smiling great leaders.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the statues and cemeteries of martyrs, memorial towers for the fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army and cemeteries of fallen fighters across the country and paid respects to the victors of the great years.
					
					 Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Band music and chorus of university students in Pyongyang while marching in array were held at Kim Il Sung Square on the same occasion. 
					
					 Art performances were given by provincial art troupes in Haeju, Sariwon, Sinuiju, Wonsan, Chongjin, Hyesan, Kanggye and Phyongsong cities. 
					
					 There took place meetings with war veterans across the country.
					
					 Youth and students visited war veterans and persons of merits in the wartime and congratulated them on the same day.

articles.title: Hall in Panmunjom, Witness to Great Victory in War
articles.content:
Hall in Panmunjom, Witness to Great Victory in War
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- There is the hall, where the Korean Armistice Agreement (KAA) was signed, in Panmunjom 8 kilometers south of Kaesong City of the DPRK.
					 At 10:00 a.m. on July 27, Juche 42 (1953), the KAA was signed by chief delegates from the DPRK side and the U.S. side in the hall.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung examined and ratified the document on the KAA at 22:00 on July 27 in Pyongyang. That day, the President stressed that the U.S. imperialist aggressors were finally forced to kneel down before the Korean people, noting that the Korean people humbled the pride of U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and brought about the beginning of decline for them for the first time in history.
					
					 Meanwhile Clark, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the "UN Forces", scarcely put his tremulous signature on the agreement before saying that he felt everything was brought to naught and he thought his predecessors MacArthur and Ridgway might agree with him.
					
					 With the conclusion of the KAA, the Korean war ended in the victory of the Korean people.
					
					 The original written KAA is still preserved in the hall to tell the victory won by the Korean people in the war.

articles.title: Songun Korea's Tradition of Steady Victory Will Last: Newspapers
articles.content:
Tradition of Steady Victory of Songun Korea Will Last: Newspapers
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Thursday carried an article written by a military commentator of the DPRK titled "Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow of Songun Korea Shine along with July 27".
					 The article said the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces try to paint their defeat in the Korean war as "victory" in ridiculous burlesques.
					
					 With nothing can they shake off their disgrace as the losers, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 This only further highlights the history of victory covered by Songun Korea.
					
					 Along with the July 27th which clearly showed the history who is the winner and who is the loser, there will be another July 27 which will bring Korea ever-lasting victory.
					
					 The article is sub-titled "Confrontation between rifle and A-bomb--immortal legendary story about victory in war," "Change in the structure of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.--great miracle in history" and "Final doom of the U.S.--the second July 27th" which said: 
					
					 The Korean War was the one whose results were easily predicted by the world people even at the initial stage of the war as the forces were utterly out of match in the light of the military power of the two belligerent parties, as well as in view of usual military common sense and customs.
					
					 But there were a series of miracles beyond expectation of people from the beginning of the war, which broke to smithereens the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S.
					
					 The provocation of the Korean war brought the U.S. imperialists a miserable end, and the victory won by the army and people of the DPRK in the war will long remain as miracle of the world history of wars. 
					
					 Today the DPRK has towered as a dignified nuclear power in the East and the world-level rocket power.
					
					 There has been a fundamental change in the strategic position of Korea and the structure of stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 This is something the U.S. deserves, for it is oblivious of the lesson of history.
					
					 The tradition of July 27 created by heroic Korea, Songun Korea brought about the great miracle which no one in the world could imagine.
					
					 It is clear who will win and who will lose in the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. that has lasted century after century.
					
					 The winner is definitely the DPRK and the loser is the U.S. 
					
					 However, still not coming to its senses, the U.S. is persisting in the hopeless confrontation with the DPRK, plunging itself deeper into the abyss of ruin.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may try, it can never evade its final ruin already sealed.
					
					 There is the only way out for the U.S. 
					
					 That is to withdraw the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and kneel and apologize before its army and people.
					
					 The tradition of steady victory of Songun Korea that started with the July 27th myth of victory in the Korean war will shine forever, the article concluded.

articles.title: Papers Observe War Victory Day
articles.content:
Papers Observe War Victory Day
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers Thursday dedicate editorials to the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that July 27 is the second liberation day for the Korean army and people when they defended the country from the U.S. imperialists' aggression and a holiday of victors who put the U.S., which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, on a downhill march towards ruin.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was an all-people resistance the Korean army and people waged against the armed invasion of the U.S.-led imperialist aggressors, in hearty response to the call of President Kim Il Sung, the paper says, adding:
					
					 In the war against the enemies superior in force, the Korean army and people gave a bitter defeat to the U.S. imperialists showing off the myth of "mightiness" and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 They worked miracles unprecedented in the world history of wars by fighting heroically in the do-or-die spirit for the country under the commandership of the President.
					
					 It is the fixed will of our Party to conclude the protracted anti-U.S. confrontation with the final victory of Juche Korea in our generation and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Let's advance forward more vigorously and quickly until the day when the U.S. completely kneels down before us with a white flag raised--this is an oath made by our army and people on the war victory day.
					
					 Courageous and resourceful sons and daughters of the great Paektusan nation, more dynamically go ahead for the final victory!
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that no force in the world will prevent our army and people from advancing forward in high spirits, rallied as one in mind around the Workers' Party of Korea, with the revolutionary spirit of Mt Paektu and the fighting spirit displayed to defend the country in 1950s as weapon of sure victory.

articles.title: DPRK Will Win Victory in Standoff with U.S.: Koreans in China
articles.content:
DPRK Will Win Victory in Standoff with U.S.: Koreans in China
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on Tuesday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The statement said it was a great significant event unprecedented in the Korean nation's history of 5 000 years that the army and people of the DPRK resolutely defeated the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to defend the sovereignty of the nation and the global peace and security.
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung's undying feats for victory in the war and the history of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership are being carried forward as the history of steady victory of Songun Korea under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, it stressed.
					
					 It expressed belief that the invincible Paektusan army would wipe out all of the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy, if they pounce upon the DPRK with reckless military provocation.
					
					 A spokesman for the Hailin City Branch of the Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on July 22 said that all Koreans in China affiliated to the branch would follow Marshal Kim Jong Un only to the last and fully discharge their duty as overseas DPRK citizens in shattering the U.S. imperialists' scheme for a nuclear war and achieving the prosperity of the homeland and its independent reunification, with the firm conviction that the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. belongs to the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Can't Change DPRK's Strategic Position: Nigerian Figure
articles.content:
U.S. Can't Change DPRK's Strategic Position: Nigerian Figure
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, released a statement on July 17 to mark the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The statement said:
					
					 July 27, 1953, was the day when the army and people of heroic Korea defeated the U.S., under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean people have strengthened the military capability for self-defence in every way to counter the heinous provocative moves of the U.S. under the leadership of the outstanding Songun brilliant commanders for over 60 years after the war.
					
					 Recently they succeeded in the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 and brought about a world historic event basically changing the situation and the balance of force in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The DPRK has provided a firm military guarantee for accelerating the victorious advance of socialism, smashing the unprecedented aggression moves and arbitrariness of the U.S. and its vassal forces. This is the victory not only of the Korean people but also of the world progressives.
					
					 The U.S. should admit the stark reality that neither sanctions nor pressure can change the strategic position of the DPRK and that there is no other way but to fundamentally repeal the hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Romania, Singapore, China, Thailand, Guinea, Nigeria and Algeria between July 1 and 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the venues of events were photos showing the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Kimilsungia, the Sun's Flower" and "The People Sing of Their Leader" were shown.
					
					 Present at the events were personages and masses in those countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion de Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion de Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta de felicitacion que le enviara la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China con motivo del 64o aniversario de la victoria en la guerra de liberacion de la patria.
					La misiva elogio como patriota sin precedente e invencible comandante de acero al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien defendio fidedignamente el destino y la dignidad de la patria y nacion frustrando tajantemente la invasion armada de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas encabezadas por los imperialistas norteamericanos y creo el milagro militar a ser registrado en la historia de guerra mundial al recibir el acta de capitulacion de EE.UU., que se jactaba de la "supremacia" del mundo.
					
					Recordo que el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il salvaguardo el socialismo centrado en masas populares preparando el poderoso disuasivo de guerra para la autodefensa mediante la politica del Songun y dirigio a las victorias sucesivas la batalla de confrontacion con EE.UU. que perduro decenas de anos, asi que hizo continuar la historia y tradicion de la victoria en la guerra, escritas por el Presidente.
					
					Encomio al Maximo Dirigente que presento la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares llevandose la ferrea voluntad de lograr la victoria final en la confrontacion anti-EE.UU. con las fuerzas armadas del Songun impregnadas de toda la vida de los grandes Lideres antecesores, y formo al Ejercito Popular de Corea como poderoso ejercito revolucionario Paektusan, asi como convirtio la RPDC en la potencia nuclear y la coheteril que cuenta con la bomba H y el ICBM.
					
					Finalizo que si los imperialistas norteamericanos vuelven a provocar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, todos los integrantes de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China estaran en la misma trinchera con el pueblo patrio y daran a los enemigos una rafaga de venganza acumulada de siglo en siglo, de manera que contribuiran a lograr la nueva victoria de guerra.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por el 27 de Julio
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por el 27 de Julio
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras colocar los cestos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la colina Mansu.
					Al pie de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Alli fueron depositados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, organismos, fabricas, empresas, escuelas, etc. a todos niveles de esta capital.
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambien ante las estatuas de bronce e imagenes con amplia sonrisa de los grandes Lideres levantadas en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Casa de Creacion de Mansudae y otros lugares de la capital y los demas localidades del pais.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a los martires participantes en la guerra
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a los martires participantes en la guerra
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 64 de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fueron depositadas el dia 27 las ofrendas florales ante las estatuas de bronce, los cementerios, los monumentos y las tumbas de los martires en las distintas localidades del pais.
					En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el poder, las entidades de masas, las fabricas, las empresas, las granjas, las escuelas y otros de las localidades, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores y los jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Fueron colocadas ante las estatuas de bronce, cementerios, monumentos y tumbas de los martires las ofrendas florales, los ramos y ramitas de flores en nombre de los organos del partido y el poder, las entidades de masas, las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, las fabricas, las empresas, las granjas, las escuelas y otros de las localidades.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos publican articulos dedicados al 27 de julio
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos publican articulos dedicados al 27 de julio
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales publicaron hoy sendos editoriales dedicadas al 64o aniversario de la gran victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el 27 de julio es el dia de segunda liberacion en que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea defendieron el territorio patrio de la agresion del imperialismo yanqui, y la fiesta de los triunfadores que pusieron en la decadencia a los yanquis que se jactaban de la "supremacia" mundial.
					
					La Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la resistencia de todo el pueblo, realizada por el ejercito y el pueblo contra la invasion armada de los agresores imperialistas encabezados por EE.UU., en acato al llamamiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, asi senala el diario y continua:
					
					En la defensiva de la libertad y la independencia de la patria, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos dieron la amarga derrota al imperialismo yanqui que se vanagloriaba del mito de la "invencibilidad".
					
					Los militares y habitantes coreanos crearon un milagro nunca visto en la historia de guerra mundial al luchar a riesgo de la vida por la unica patria bajo la direccion del Presidente.
					
					Es la voluntad inconmovible del partido lograr en nuestra generacion la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria tras salir sin falta victorioso en la prolongada confrontacion con EE.UU.
					
					Con motivo del dia de la victoria en la guerra, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea toman juramento de avanzar mas rapido y saltar mas alto hasta cuando el imperialismo yanqui se hincara de rodillas.
					
					!Adelante los hijos valientes y talentosos de la potencia Paektusan hacia la victoria final!
					
					El periodico Minju Joson subraya que nadie y nada puede frenar el avance del ejercito y el pueblo coreano, unido compactamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, que marchan haciendo gala del espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el otro de defensa a la patria de la decada de 1950.

articles.title: Rotativos coreanos subrayan la tradicion de victoria eterna de la Corea del Songun
articles.content:
Rotativos coreanos subrayan la tradicion de victoria eterna de la Corea del Songun
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales coreanos divulgaron hoy el articulo de un comentarista militar intitulado "El pasado, el presente y el futuro de la Corea del Songun que brilla por el 27 de Julio".
					El articulo menciono primero que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos intentan orquestar unas farsas ridiculas para invertir como "victoria" su derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					A pesar de sus ardides "ingeniosas" para poner al reves los hechos, ellos no podran quitarse la deshonra de derrotado, afirma el comentarista.
					
					Por el contrario, esa locura de los vencidos pone de relieve la historia de victoria orgullosa de la Corea del Songun, apunta.
					
					Al igual que aquel 27 de julio de 1953 que habia senalado claramente en la historia quien es el triunfador y cual es el derrotado, llegara el segundo 27 de julio que significaria la victoria eterna de la RPDC, sentencia.
					
					Bajo los subtitulos de "Inmortal mito de victoria en la guerra-confrontacion entre el fusil y la bomba atomica", "Gran milagro de la historia-cambio de la estructura de confrontacion Corea-EE.UU." y "Segundo 27 de julio-ruina definitiva de EE.UU.", el comentarista senala como sigue:
					
					En vista de los conocimientos militares elementales y las costumbres de guerra y en comparacion de las fuerzas armadas de ambas partes beligerantes, la guerra coreana fue tan desigual que todo el mundo podia pronosticar su resultado desde el principio.
					
					Sin embargo, se hizo anicos el mito de "invencibilidad" de EE.UU. desde el comienzo de guerra y ocurrieron milagros que cambiaron las conjeturas de la gente.
					
					La provocacion de la guerra coreana hizo miserable el destino del imperialismo norteamericano y la victoria lograda por nuestro ejercito y pueblo se registro como milagro en la historia mundial de guerras.
					
					Hoy dia, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea emergio como digna potencia nuclear del Oriente y la coheteril de talla mundial.
					
					Se cambiaron radicalmente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la estructura de confrontacion entre ella y EE.UU.
					
					Esto es el precio que debio pagar EE.UU. por olvidar las lecciones de la historia.
					
					La tradicion del 27 de julio, creada por la Corea heroica del Songun, hizo posible el gran milagro de hoy que nadie pudo imaginar.
					
					Ya se ha definido el resultado de la confrontacion de siglos RPDC-EE.UU.; la primera es vencedora y el segundo es derrotado.
					
					Sin embargo, sin darse cuenta todavia de su situacion, EE.UU. se empantana cada vez mas en el abismo de arruinamiento recurriendo de continuo al enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					Por muy desesperados que fueran sus ultimos esfuerzos, EE.UU. no podra evitar su destino manifiesto de ruina definitiva.
					
					Su unica salvacion reside en cancelar su anacronica politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC y pedir disculpas de rodillas y lo mas pronto posible al ejercito y pueblo de Corea.
					
					Brillara siempre la tradicion de victoria de la Corea del Songun que tiene su origen en el mito de victoria en guerra del 27 de Julio.
